p: Human serum samples ( n = 48; obtained before and after vaccination) were kindly provided by the Laboratory of Molecular Epidemiology, Department of Molecular and Developmental Medicine, University of Siena, where they had been stored in compliance with Italian ethics law. The following information was available for each serum sample: adult (18+ years) or child (3–9 years) age-group, year of sampling (2009–2010), and pre- and post-vaccination withdrawal.
